title: Jean Gebser's Ever Present Origin, with Jeremy Johnson
description:
Jean Gebser was a philosopher and linguist whose most famous work, "The Ever-Present Origin" remains hugely influential, particularly on developmental thinkers such as Ken Wilber.

For this first Rebel Wisdom Book Club host Jules Evans was joined by perhaps the world's leading expert on Gebser, Jeremy Johnson, to discuss the book and Gebser's timeless influence.

To view extracts of the book discussed during the call, click here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/15shjrB9tRE2lYa_yszQnfaVIwhfDEhLv/view

This was an event on Rebel Wisdom's newly relaunched Digital Campfire, to see upcoming events and to join calls, check here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/campfire-events
